member.name: T:Ceiba.Web.Middleware.AuthorizationLoggingMiddleware
member.summary: RS-001 Mitigation: Authorization logging middleware. Logs all unauthorized access attempts for security monitoring.

member.name: T:Ceiba.Web.Middleware.ErrorHandlingMiddleware
member.summary: Global exception handling middleware. Catches unhandled exceptions, logs them, and returns appropriate error responses. Implements secure error handling (no sensitive data in production).

member.name: T:Ceiba.Web.Middleware.UserAgentValidationMiddleware
member.summary: RS-005 Mitigation: User-Agent validation middleware. Detects and blocks suspicious session hijacking attempts by validating User-Agent consistency.
